text.quest1a: Bitten by the sand fleas and since he was also stranded on the beach, he faced an uncomfortable night.
text.explain1a: (B) The structure after the "and" should be also a past participle.
text.quest1: I bought a large turkey, and it was dressed by the butcher on the spot.
text.explain1: (C) Both independent clauses must be written in the active voice.
